name: Fate & Fortunes
description:
Take the role of Grayson Asher, a bounty hunter in search of the mischievous criminal known as Nim Eveller. Having followed her trail all the way to "The Lazy Herb" Inn, Asher must now find a way to stop whatever Nim is scheming. But along the way he discovers that there might be more to the inn than he had expected...

Chapter 1 is now available, with two more chapters to come later.

This is an entirely narrative driven game. There is no combat as of now.

This game was originally made for RPG Maker Jam #3. 

Music Credit:Kevin Macleod
